front.title: Extended IEEE802.1x Support Authentication of users sharing a Single Ethernet Port

abstract.t: IEEE802.1x standard provides a method to authenticate users based on port and does not support authentication of multi-user sharing a single port.This document extended IEEE802.1x to support authentication of users sharing a single ethernet port.Also this document makes modification to the EAP(The Extensible Authentication Protocol, defined in [RFC2284])message.
